attributes.action: Leave the EU with or without a deal by the 29th March, prevent a 2nd referendum
attributes.additional_details:
This option will continue to cause huge division across the country, uncertainty amongst businesses and EU countries time to secure business moves out of the UK.
If a second referendum is indeed voted for by parliament when will the third public referendum take place if remain is the outcome this time around? This has to stop now and let the country move on, build world trade as we did prior to our membership.
attributes.background: The Brexit negotiations have had years to be negotiated. It is clear now that the EU have agreed all that they will in order to force the UK into delay, hope a second referendum is run and they get their preferable outcome that we remain. This is a common tactic of the EU.
